article_title: 'It's A Big Deal' Biden Mutters During Obama Speech on Obamacare
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Vice President Joe Biden reminded everyone of his opinion that Obamacare is a “big deal” today in the Rose Garden as he stood next to President Obama during his statement reacting to the Supreme Court ruling in favor of the law.

Biden was likely flashing back to Obama’s 2010 celebration speech on passing Obamacare, in which Biden famously said, “This is a big fucking deal” to Obama as he hugged the president.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

This time, however, Biden decided not to drop the f’word.
